targets.rawSql: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM trivy_results tr JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id WHERE br.project = '$project' AND tr.severity IN ('HIGH','CRITICAL')) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as status;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS secret_count
FROM trivy_secrets ts
JOIN build_reports br ON ts.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
      SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
      FROM build_reports 
      WHERE project = '$project'
  );

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_critical
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
      SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
      FROM build_reports 
      WHERE project = '$project'
  )
  AND tr.severity = 'CRITICAL' and tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
    FROM build_reports 
    WHERE project = br.project
  )
  AND tr.severity = 'HIGH' and tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
    FROM build_reports 
    WHERE project = br.project
  )
  AND tr.severity = 'MEDIUM' and tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
    FROM build_reports 
    WHERE project = br.project
  )
  AND tr.severity = 'LOW' and tr.is_exception=0;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
    SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
    FROM build_reports 
    WHERE project = br.project
  )
  AND tr.is_exception=1;

SELECT br.tag
FROM build_reports br
WHERE br.project = '$project'
ORDER BY br.timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    br.id AS build_id,
    br.image,
    br.tag,
    br.ci_url,
    br.timestamp,

    -- Count vulnerabilities by severity
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'CRITICAL' AND tr.is_exception=0) AS critical_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'HIGH' AND tr.is_exception=0)     AS high_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'MEDIUM' AND tr.is_exception=0)   AS medium_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity = 'LOW' AND tr.is_exception=0)      AS low_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.severity IS NULL OR tr.severity = '' AND tr.is_exception=0) AS unknown_count,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE tr.is_exception=1)  AS exception_count,

    -- Total vulnerabilities and secrets
    COUNT(DISTINCT tr.id) AS total_vulnerabilities,
    COUNT(DISTINCT ts.id) AS total_secrets

FROM build_reports br
LEFT JOIN trivy_results tr ON tr.build_id = br.id
LEFT JOIN trivy_secrets ts ON ts.build_id = br.id

WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
      SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
      FROM build_reports 
      WHERE project = br.project
  )

GROUP BY br.id, br.project, br.image, br.tag, br.ci_url, br.timestamp
ORDER BY br.timestamp DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    ts.target AS file_name,
    ts.rule_id,
    ts.category,
    ts.severity,
    ts.title,
    ts.match,
    ts.timestamp
FROM trivy_secrets ts
JOIN build_reports br ON ts.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND br.timestamp = (
      SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
      FROM build_reports 
      WHERE project = '$project'
  )
ORDER BY ts.timestamp DESC;

panels.title: Secrets Exposed on the latest build

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    tr.vuln_id,
    tr.pkg_name,
    tr.installed,
    tr.fixed,
    tr.severity,
    tr.status,
    tr.primary_url,
    tr.timestamp
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project' AND tr.is_exception=0
  AND br.timestamp = (
      SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
      FROM build_reports 
      WHERE project = '$project'
  )
ORDER BY tr.severity DESC, tr.vuln_id;

SELECT 
    tr.vuln_id,
    tr.pkg_name,
    tr.installed,
    tr.fixed,
    tr.severity,
    tr.status,
    tr.primary_url,
    tr.timestamp
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project' AND tr.is_exception=1
  AND br.timestamp = (
      SELECT MAX(timestamp) 
      FROM build_reports 
      WHERE project = '$project'
  )
ORDER BY tr.severity DESC, tr.vuln_id;

SELECT 
    br.id AS build_id,
    tr.severity AS metric,
    COUNT(*) AS value
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
GROUP BY br.id, tr.severity

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    br.id AS build_id,
    'CRITICAL' AS metric,   -- Secrets forced into CRITICAL bucket
    COUNT(*) AS value
FROM trivy_secrets ts
JOIN build_reports br ON ts.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
  AND ts.severity = 'CRITICAL'
GROUP BY br.id

ORDER BY build_id;
SELECT ts.category as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM trivy_secrets ts JOIN build_reports br ON ts.build_id = br.id WHERE br.project = '$project' GROUP BY ts.category;

SELECT 
    br.id,
    br.image,
    br.tag,
    br.timestamp,
    CASE 
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 
            FROM trivy_results tr 
            WHERE tr.build_id = br.id 
              AND tr.severity IN ('HIGH','CRITICAL')
        ) 
        THEN 'FAIL' 
        ELSE 'PASS' 
    END AS build_status,
    'Build Details' AS reference_text,  -- Show this in the table
    br.id AS reference_id               -- Use this for linking
FROM build_reports br
WHERE br.project = '$project'
ORDER BY br.timestamp DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT tr.vuln_id,
       COUNT(*) AS occurrences,
       MIN(tr.severity) AS severity
FROM trivy_results tr
JOIN build_reports br ON tr.build_id = br.id
WHERE br.project = '$project'
GROUP BY tr.vuln_id
ORDER BY occurrences DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT ts.rule_id, ts.category, ts.severity, ts.title, ts.match, ts.timestamp FROM trivy_secrets ts JOIN build_reports br ON ts.build_id = br.id WHERE br.project = '$project' ORDER BY ts.timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;

list.label: Project Name
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT project FROM build_reports ORDER BY project;
